attributes.action: Call a UK referendum before the new European Treaty is signed and before any further powers are signed away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Tony Blair is about to sign a new treaty, which is a cut down version of the failed EU constitution, renamed as a treaty to get it pushed through without the need for a referendum. We demand the right to have a say in this process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
